meanings.definition: One thousandth of a lux, a unit of illumination equal to one lumen per square meter.
meanings.sent1: The room was dimly lit with only a few millilux of light coming through the window.
meanings.sent2: The millilux measurement indicated the low level of brightness in the area.
meanings.sent3: I tried to read with just a millilux of light, but it was too dark to see anything clearly.
meanings.sent4: In the cave, the millilux of light felt like a tiny beacon in the darkness.
meanings.sent5: The millilux of moonlight filtering through the trees created a magical atmosphere.
